content.raw:
I think this still needs to be added to `ign-physics`; I don't see anything about friction or the surface properties in the dart plugin:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/src/4732aad04aa50e8593692733276101f82ccb2916/dartsim/src/SDFFeatures.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#SDFFeatures.cc-422:461

cc: @azeey @mxgrey
